update(CityResources) - Method in class model.tiles.CommercialTile
Update changes the state of the building if their are riot happening in the city and puts the building on riot mode so that it stops producing anything.
update(CityResources) - Method in class model.tiles.ForestTile
updates does nothing because forest tiles do not change with time.

updates calculates the new cell capacity every turn depending on the budget spent on security

update(CityResources) - Method in class model.tiles.PolicestationTile
updates calculates the new Policestation capacity every turn depending on the budget spent on security
update(CityResources) - Method in class model.tiles.PowerPlantTile
while the building is standing up, update increases it's production each turn before reaching the maximum production
update(CityResources) - Method in class model.tiles.PublicGardenTile
updates give (each round) a fixed amount of happiness and a variable amount given the money spent on public garden maintenance
update(CityResources) - Method in class model.tiles.ResidentialTile
Update changes the state of the building if their are riot happening in the city and puts the building on riot mode so that it stops producing anything.
update(CityResources) - Method in class model.tiles.RoadTile
update does not do anything since roads do not change with time
